mapper.insert: INSERT INTO basket (bcode, username, pcode, amount) VALUES (null,#{username} ,#{pcode}, #{amount});
mapper.select: SELECT b.bcode, b.amount, p.pcode, p.pname, p.price, p.stock, p.img FROM basket b LEFT JOIN product p ON b.pcode = p.pcode WHERE username = #{param1}
SELECT * FROM basket WHERE username = #{param1} AND pcode = #{param2}
mapper.update: UPDATE basket SET amount = #{param2} WHERE bcode = #{param1}
